title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Stories
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories         The lighting of the Mishumaa Saba, or seven candles. NPS  Adinkra Symbols Explained: Learn the meaning of these symbols that are so important to the various African cultures and peoples.   The African Burial Ground celebrates a number of events annually. These include:  Martin Luther King's birthday African American History Month Women's History Month National Park Week Pinkster Juneteenth Youth Week Kwanzaa
